log.error: Error importing XML: 'There is no XML format with name: 'XHTML-TRANSACTIONS' (ERR0206)' (ERR0257)

xmlText.hl2: Eds: Deletes Mets transaction, which is not a final agreement.
xmlText.p: SAN DIEGO PADRES — Agreed to terms with LHP Brad Hand on a three-year contract.<
NEW ORLEANS PELICANS — Signed G Mike James to a two-way contract.
NEW YORK KNICKS — Signed G Trey Burke.<
SOUTH BAY LAKERS — Waived G Ian Baker.
BUFFALO BILLS — Named Brian Daboll offensive coordinator.
NHL — Suspended Anaheim F Andrew Cogliano two games, without pay, for an interference penalty against Los Angeles F Adrian Kempe on Saturday night.
BUFFALO SABRES — Assigned G Jonas Johansson from Rochester (AHL) to Cincinnati (ECHL).
CALGARY FLAMES — Placed F Jaromir Jagr on injured reserve, retroactive to Dec. 31. Recalled F Ryan Lomberg from Stockton (AHL).
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Reassigned F Lucas Wallmark to Charlotte (AHL).
COLORADO AVALANCHE — Recalled F J.C. Beaudin from Colorado (ECHL) to San Antonio (AHL).
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Recalled F Jonny Brodzinski from Ontario (AHL).<
BINGHAMTON DEVILS — Returned F Phil Lane on loan to Atlanta (ECHL).
BRIDGEPORT SOUND TIGERS — Recalled F Kellen Jones and D Mike Cornell from Worcester (ECHL).
CHARLOTTE CHECKERS — Recalled F Mitchell Heard from Florida (ECHL).
PROVIDENCE BRUINS — Recalled D Ben Marshall from Atlanta (ECHL).
SAN ANTONIO RAMPAGE — Recalled F Shawn St. Amant from Colorado (ECHL). Reassigned F Thomas Frazee to Norfolk (ECHL).
SPRINGFIELD THUNDERBIRDS — Assigned F Francois Beauchemin to Manchester (ECHL).
TORONTO MARLIES — Recalled F Jean Dupuy from Orlando (ECHL).
WILKES-BARRE/SCRANTON PENGUINS — Assigned F Cody Wydo to Wheeling (ECHL).<
ADIRONDACK THUNDER — Released G Joe Spadaccini as emergency backup. Added G T.J. Sherwood as emergency backup.
ATLANTA GLADIATORS — Signed F Tommy Kelley.
FLORIDA EVERBLADES — Signed F Keegan Bruce.
IDAHO STEELHEADS — Released G Doug Melvin as emergency backup.
ORLANDO SOLAR BEARS — Released G Gordon Defiel as emergency backup.<
